title: Nagaland football team
text:
The Nagaland football team is the official football team for <a href="Nagaland">Nagaland</a>, <a href="India">India</a>.
This team mainly competes in the <a href="Santosh%20Trophy">Santosh Trophy</a> and in the NE Dr T Ao Trophy, that are the domestic competitions in <a href="India">India</a>.
